con:testCase.name: SO Fraud Detection - IP
con:testCase.con:description: Standing Order Agreement which hits Fraud Criteria IP Address

con:request.name: SO Auth
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:urn="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:ws:paymentauthorization:v1_2" xmlns:urn1="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:paymentauthorization:v1_2" xmlns:urn2="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:authorization:v1_2" xmlns:urn3="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:authorization:v1_1"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>${Properties#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>${Properties#DestinationApplication}</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>1.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${Properties#UserID}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>${Properties#channel}</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid> <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip> <wsc:item key="AgreementId" value="${Properties#AgreementId}"/> <wsc:item key="PaymentChannel" value="${Properties#PaymentChannel_BM}"/> <wsc:item key="LogRef" value="dd5dbe72-42d8-4a28-a725-5224c185545b"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:PaymentAuthorizationCreateRequest> <urn:cpsAuthorizationMessage> <urn1:cpsUserAuthorizationData> <urn2:agreementData> <urn3:agreementId>${Properties#AgreementId}</urn3:agreementId> <urn3:bankId>${Properties#bankId}</urn3:bankId> <urn3:customerID>${Properties#customerid}</urn3:customerID> <urn3:productID>${Properties#customerid}</urn3:productID> </urn2:agreementData> <urn2:userId>${Properties#UserID}</urn2:userId> <urn2:sessionID>${=Math.abs(new Random().nextInt() % 6000000) + 1}</urn2:sessionID> <urn2:firstName>Test</urn2:firstName> <urn2:lastName>Cust</urn2:lastName> <urn2:userAccount> <urn2:accountNumber>${Properties#accountNumber}</urn2:accountNumber> <urn2:accountOwnerIdentifier>${=Math.abs(new Random().nextInt() % 6000000) + 1}</urn2:accountOwnerIdentifier> <urn2:currencyCode>${Properties#currencyCode}</urn2:currencyCode> <urn2:accountType>${Properties#accountType}</urn2:accountType> <urn2:role>View</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Register</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Appprove</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Salary</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Transfer</urn2:role> <urn2:approvalLimit>${Properties#approvalLimit}</urn2:approvalLimit> <urn2:registerLimit>${Properties#registerLimit}</urn2:registerLimit> <urn2:numberOfVerifiers>${Properties#numberOfVerifiers}</urn2:numberOfVerifiers> <urn2:numberOfApprovers>${Properties#numberOfApprovers}</urn2:numberOfApprovers> <urn2:bookingLevel>${Properties#bookingLevel}</urn2:bookingLevel> </urn2:userAccount> </urn1:cpsUserAuthorizationData> </urn:cpsAuthorizationMessage> </urn:PaymentAuthorizationCreateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: SO Create
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:urn="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:ws:standingorder:v1_5" xmlns:urn1="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:standingorder:v1_5" xmlns:urn2="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:creditor:v1_5"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>${Properties#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>${Properties#DestinationApplication}</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>1.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${Properties#UserID}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>${Properties#channel}</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid> <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:ip>${Properties#fraudIpAddress}</wsc:ip> <wsc:item key="AgreementId" value="${Properties#AgreementId}"/> <wsc:item key="PaymentChannel" value="${Properties#PaymentChannel_BM}"/> <wsc:item key="LogRef" value="${=CommonLibrary.getDate('ddMMyyyy_HHmmss')}-${=context.getCurrentStep().getTestCase().getLabel()}"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:standingOrderCreateRequest> <urn:standingOrder> <urn1:recurrence>WEEKLY</urn1:recurrence> <urn1:dueDates> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <urn1:dueDate>${=CommonLibrary.getDate('yyyy-MM-dd')}</urn1:dueDate> </urn1:dueDates> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <urn1:bankHolidayAdjustment>BEFORE</urn1:bankHolidayAdjustment> <urn1:exemptions> <urn1:exemption> <urn1:startDate>${=CommonLibrary.getDate(4,'yyyy-MM-dd')}</urn1:startDate> <urn1:endDate>${=CommonLibrary.getDate(6,'yyyy-MM-dd')}</urn1:endDate> <urn1:recurring>false</urn1:recurring> <urn1:description>DescriptionOneExemption</urn1:description> </urn1:exemption> </urn1:exemptions> <urn1:paymentInfo> <urn3:debtorAccount xmlns:urn3="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:debtor:v1_5"> <urn4:identification xmlns:urn4="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7">${Properties#accountNumber}</urn4:identification> <urn4:currency xmlns:urn4="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7">${Properties#currencyCode}</urn4:currency> </urn3:debtorAccount> </urn1:paymentInfo> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <urn1:transaction> <urn2:amount> <urn3:instructedAmount currency="${Properties#currencyCode}" xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7"> <urn3:amount>${Properties#Amount}</urn3:amount> </urn3:instructedAmount> </urn2:amount> <urn2:chargeBearer>SHAR</urn2:chargeBearer> <urn2:creditorAgent> <urn3:bic xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7">${Properties#CreditorAgent}</urn3:bic> <urn3:postalAddress xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7"> <urn3:postCode>4502</urn3:postCode><urn3:townName>test</urn3:townName> <urn3:countrySubDivision>testing</urn3:countrySubDivision><urn3:country>${Properties#CreditorCountry}</urn3:country>
</urn3:postalAddress> </urn2:creditorAgent> <urn2:creditor> <urn3:name xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7">cred</urn3:name> <urn3:postalAddress xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7"> <urn3:postCode>4502</urn3:postCode><urn3:townName>test</urn3:townName> <urn3:countrySubDivision>test</urn3:countrySubDivision><urn3:country>${Properties#CreditorCountry}</urn3:country>
</urn3:postalAddress> </urn2:creditor> <urn2:creditorAccount> <urn3:identification xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7">${Properties#CreditAccountNumber}</urn3:identification> <urn3:currency xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7">${Properties#CreditorCurrency}</urn3:currency> </urn2:creditorAccount> <urn2:ultimateCreditor> <urn3:name xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7">cred</urn3:name> </urn2:ultimateCreditor> </urn1:transaction> <urn1:standingOrderType>PERIODIC</urn1:standingOrderType> </urn:standingOrder> </urn:standingOrderCreateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Body> <ns3:standingOrderCreateResponse xmlns:ns8="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:creditor:v1_5" xmlns:ns7="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:debtor:v1_5" xmlns:ns6="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7" xmlns:ns5="http://control.ws.payment.edb.com" xmlns:ns4="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:common:v1" xmlns:ns3="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:ws:standingorder:v1_5" xmlns:ns2="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:standingorder:v1_5" xmlns="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21"> <ns4:ResponseState> <ErrorCode>0</ErrorCode> <Severity>0</Severity> <ComponentId>100</ComponentId> <StrErrorCode xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <Message>OK</Message> <NativeError xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <LogSequence xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> </ns4:ResponseState> <ns3:standingOrderKey> <ns2:agreementId>2534</ns2:agreementId> <ns2:agreementVersion>1</ns2:agreementVersion> </ns3:standingOrderKey> <ns3:futureTransactions> <ns2:dueDate>2019-11-25+01:00</ns2:dueDate> <ns2:identifier>Payment Identifier not generated</ns2:identifier> </ns3:futureTransactions> <ns3:futureTransactions> <ns2:dueDate>2019-12-02+01:00</ns2:dueDate> <ns2:identifier>Payment Identifier not generated</ns2:identifier> </ns3:futureTransactions> <ns3:futureTransactions> <ns2:dueDate>2019-12-09+01:00</ns2:dueDate> <ns2:identifier>Payment Identifier not generated</ns2:identifier> </ns3:futureTransactions> <ns3:futureTransactions> <ns2:dueDate>2019-12-16+01:00</ns2:dueDate> <ns2:identifier>Payment Identifier not generated</ns2:identifier> </ns3:futureTransactions> <ns3:futureTransactions> <ns2:dueDate>2019-12-23+01:00</ns2:dueDate> <ns2:identifier>Payment Identifier not generated</ns2:identifier> </ns3:futureTransactions> <ns3:futureTransactions> <ns2:dueDate>2019-12-30+01:00</ns2:dueDate> <ns2:identifier>Payment Identifier not generated</ns2:identifier> </ns3:futureTransactions> </ns3:standingOrderCreateResponse> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>

con:request.name: SO Confirm
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:urn="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:ws:standingorder:v1_5" xmlns:urn1="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:standingorder:v1_5"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>${Properties#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>${Properties#DestinationApplication}</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>1.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${Properties#UserID}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>${Properties#channel}</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid> <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip> <wsc:item key="AgreementId" value="${Properties#AgreementId}"/> <wsc:item key="PaymentChannel" value="${Properties#PaymentChannel_BM}"/> <wsc:item key="LogRef" value="dd5dbe72-42d8-4a28-a725-5224c185545b"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:standingOrderStatusUpdateRequest> <urn:standingOrderKey> <urn1:agreementId>${SO Create#Response#declare namespace ns2='urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:standingorder:v1_5'; declare namespace ns3='urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:ws:standingorder:v1_5'; //ns3:standingOrderCreateResponse[1]/ns3:standingOrderKey[1]/ns2:agreementId[1]}</urn1:agreementId><urn1:agreementVersion>${SO Create#Response#declare namespace ns2='urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:standingorder:v1_5'; declare namespace ns3='urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:ws:standingorder:v1_5'; //ns3:standingOrderCreateResponse[1]/ns3:standingOrderKey[1]/ns2:agreementVersion[1]}</urn1:agreementVersion> </urn:standingOrderKey> <urn:standingOrderAction>CONFIRM</urn:standingOrderAction> </urn:standingOrderStatusUpdateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: SO APPROVE
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:urn="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:ws:standingorder:v1_5" xmlns:urn1="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:standingorder:v1_5"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>${Properties#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>${Properties#DestinationApplication}</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>1.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${Properties#UserID}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>${Properties#channel}</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid> <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip> <wsc:item key="AgreementId" value="${Properties#AgreementId}"/> <wsc:item key="PaymentChannel" value="${Properties#PaymentChannel_BM}"/> <wsc:item key="LogRef" value="dd5dbe72-42d8-4a28-a725-5224c185545b"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:standingOrderStatusUpdateRequest> <urn:standingOrderKey> <urn1:agreementId>${SO Create#Response#declare namespace ns2='urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:standingorder:v1_5'; declare namespace ns3='urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:ws:standingorder:v1_5'; //ns3:standingOrderCreateResponse[1]/ns3:standingOrderKey[1]/ns2:agreementId[1]}</urn1:agreementId><urn1:agreementVersion>${SO Create#Response#declare namespace ns2='urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:standingorder:v1_5'; declare namespace ns3='urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:ws:standingorder:v1_5'; //ns3:standingOrderCreateResponse[1]/ns3:standingOrderKey[1]/ns2:agreementVersion[1]}</urn1:agreementVersion> </urn:standingOrderKey> <urn:standingOrderAction>APPROVE</urn:standingOrderAction> </urn:standingOrderStatusUpdateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.con:query: select * from STO_AGREEMENT where AGREEMENTID = '${SO Create#Response#declare namespace ns2='urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:standingorder:v1_5'; declare namespace ns3='urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:ws:standingorder:v1_5'; //ns3:standingOrderCreateResponse[1]/ns3:standingOrderKey[1]/ns2:agreementId[1]}'
select TRANSACTIONSID from STO_RECURRENCE_COMPLETED where FK_AGREEMENT_INTERNAL_ID ='${STO_AGREEMENT#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/INTERNAL_ID[1]}'

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: <Results> <ResultSet fetchSize="10"> <Row rowNumber="1"> <DUE_DATE>2019-11-25 00:00:00</DUE_DATE> <FK_AGREEMENT_INTERNAL_ID>41161</FK_AGREEMENT_INTERNAL_ID> <CREATED_DATETIME>2019-11-18 11:28:58.819712</CREATED_DATETIME> <TRANSACTIONSID>342030</TRANSACTIONSID> <PAYMENT_REF>342030</PAYMENT_REF> </Row> <Row rowNumber="2"> <DUE_DATE>2019-12-02 00:00:00</DUE_DATE> <FK_AGREEMENT_INTERNAL_ID>41161</FK_AGREEMENT_INTERNAL_ID> <CREATED_DATETIME>2019-11-18 11:28:58.819712</CREATED_DATETIME> <TRANSACTIONSID>342031</TRANSACTIONSID> <PAYMENT_REF>342031</PAYMENT_REF> </Row> <Row rowNumber="3"> <DUE_DATE>2019-12-09 00:00:00</DUE_DATE> <FK_AGREEMENT_INTERNAL_ID>41161</FK_AGREEMENT_INTERNAL_ID> <CREATED_DATETIME>2019-11-18 11:28:58.819712</CREATED_DATETIME> <TRANSACTIONSID>342029</TRANSACTIONSID> <PAYMENT_REF>342029</PAYMENT_REF> </Row> <Row rowNumber="4"> <DUE_DATE>2019-12-16 00:00:00</DUE_DATE> <FK_AGREEMENT_INTERNAL_ID>41161</FK_AGREEMENT_INTERNAL_ID> <CREATED_DATETIME>2019-11-18 11:28:58.819712</CREATED_DATETIME> <TRANSACTIONSID>342028</TRANSACTIONSID> <PAYMENT_REF>342028</PAYMENT_REF> </Row> <Row rowNumber="5"> <DUE_DATE>2019-12-23 00:00:00</DUE_DATE> <FK_AGREEMENT_INTERNAL_ID>41161</FK_AGREEMENT_INTERNAL_ID> <CREATED_DATETIME>2019-11-18 11:28:58.819712</CREATED_DATETIME> <TRANSACTIONSID>342032</TRANSACTIONSID> <PAYMENT_REF>342032</PAYMENT_REF> </Row> <Row rowNumber="6"> <DUE_DATE>2019-12-30 00:00:00</DUE_DATE> <FK_AGREEMENT_INTERNAL_ID>41161</FK_AGREEMENT_INTERNAL_ID> <CREATED_DATETIME>2019-11-18 11:28:58.819712</CREATED_DATETIME> <TRANSACTIONSID>342033</TRANSACTIONSID> <PAYMENT_REF>342033</PAYMENT_REF> </Row> </ResultSet> </Results>

con:config.con:query: select a.TRANSACTIONSID,b.riskstatus from STO_RECURRENCE_COMPLETED a ,transactions b where FK_AGREEMENT_INTERNAL_ID ='${STO_AGREEMENT#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/INTERNAL_ID[1]}' and a.TRANSACTIONSID=b.TRANSACTIONSID
